channel.title: Carbide-Tools on Micro-Precision Carbide
channel.description: Recent content in Carbide-Tools on Micro-Precision Carbide

item.title: Metal & Wood Cutting Tools
item.description: Cutting tools are instruments used in machining for material removal.Since most tools in mechanical manufacturing are designed for cutting metal materials, the term “cutting tool” is generally understood to mean metal-cutting tools. Tools specifically for cutting wood are referred to as woodworking tools.

item.title: Mining & Excavation Tools
item.description: For applications including mine excavation, tunnel boring, trenching & pile foundation excavation, terrain leveling, building demolition, rock & permafrost excavation, and road milling.
